pkgmetadata.longdescription: R/FrEAK interface // An R interface to a modified version of the Free Evolutionary Algorithm Kit FrEAK. FrEAK is a toolkit written in Java to design and analyze evolutionary algorithms. Both the R interface and an extended version of FrEAK are contained in the RFreak package. For more information on FrEAK see http://sourceforge.net/projects/freak427/.
